cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aku

sentence.kanji: 電車のドアが開きました。
sentence.romaji: densha no doa ga akimashita
sentence.english: The train door opened.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mondai

sentence.kanji: 問題が一つあります。
sentence.romaji: mondai ga hitotsu arimasu
sentence.english: There's one problem.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ningen

sentence.kanji: 人間の心は複雑です。
sentence.romaji: ningen no kokoro ha fukuzatsu desu
sentence.english: Man's mind is complex.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaishi

sentence.kanji: 運動会は9時開始です。
sentence.romaji: undoukai ha kuji kaishi desu
sentence.english: The athletic meet begins at nine o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's machigai

sentence.kanji: この文には間違いがあります。
sentence.romaji: kono bun ni ha machigai ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a mistake in this sentence.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's machigaeru

sentence.kanji: 電話番号を間違えました。
sentence.romaji: denwa bangou wo machigaemashita
sentence.english: I called the wrong number.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's machigau

sentence.kanji: あなたは間違っている。
sentence.romaji: anata ha machigate iru
sentence.english: You're mistaken.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's konoaida

sentence.kanji: この間彼女に会った。
sentence.romaji: konoaida kanojo ni ata
sentence.english: I met her the other day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ketei

sentence.kanji: 会議で重要な決定がありました。
sentence.romaji: kaigi de juuyou na ketei ga arimashita
sentence.english: An important decision was made at the conference.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiruma

sentence.kanji: 昼間は仕事で忙しいです。
sentence.romaji: hiruma ha shigoto de isogashii desu
sentence.english: I'm busy with work in the daytime.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koukai

sentence.kanji: その映画は今日、公開されます。
sentence.romaji: sono eiga ha kyou koukai saremasu
sentence.english: The movie opens to the public today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hijouni

sentence.kanji: これは非常に重要です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha hijou ni juuyou desu
sentence.english: This is very important.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aida

sentence.kanji: 雲の間から月が出た。
sentence.romaji: kumo no aida kara tsuki ga deta
sentence.english: The moon came out from between the clouds.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinbun

sentence.kanji: 今日の新聞、どこに置いた?
sentence.romaji: kyou no shinbun doko ni oita
sentence.english: Where did you put today's newspaper?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kikoeru

sentence.kanji: 隣の部屋からテレビの音が聞こえる。
sentence.romaji: tonari no heya kara terebi no oto ga kikoeru
sentence.english: I can hear the sound of the television from the next room.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nenkan

sentence.kanji: 年間5万人がここを訪れます。
sentence.romaji: nenkan gomannin ga koko wo otozuremasu
sentence.english: This place gets 50,000 visitors a year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanashimu

sentence.kanji: 父は友だちの死を悲しんでいます。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha tomodachi no shi wo kanashinde imasu
sentence.english: My father is grieving because of his friend's death.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaisai

sentence.kanji: 京都で国際会議が開催された。
sentence.romaji: kyouto de kokusaikaigi ga kaisai sareta
sentence.english: An international conference was held in Kyoto.

cards.english: be in time, answer the purpose, can do without
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maniau

sentence.kanji: 授業に間に合いました。
sentence.romaji: jugyou ni maniaimashita
sentence.english: I made it in time for class.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's erai

sentence.kanji: 彼は偉い学者です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha erai gakusha desu
sentence.english: He's a great scholar.

cards.english: by all means, at any cost
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zehi

sentence.kanji: 是非、うちに来てください。
sentence.romaji: zehi uchi ni kite kudasai
sentence.english: By all means come to my house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aki

sentence.kanji: このブラウスは後ろ開きです。
sentence.romaji: kono burausu ha ushiroaki desu
sentence.english: This blouse opens from the back.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maniawaseru

sentence.kanji: 昼食はクッキーで間に合わせたの。
sentence.romaji: chuushoku ha kuki- de maniawaseta no
sentence.english: I made do with cookies for lunch.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyakuma

sentence.kanji: お客さんを客間にお通ししたわよ。
sentence.romaji: okyakusan wo kyakuma ni otooshi shita wa yo
sentence.english: I showed the guest into the reception room.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tema

sentence.kanji: これはとても手間のかかる料理です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha totemo tema no kakaru ryouri desu
sentence.english: This is a very time-consuming dish.

cards.english: opening of a store, setting up
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaiten

sentence.kanji: デパートは10時に開店しますよ。
sentence.romaji: depa-to ha juuji ni kaiten shimasu yo
sentence.english: The department store opens at ten o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heiten

sentence.kanji: この店は8時に閉店します。
sentence.romaji: kono mise ha 8 ji ni heiten shimasu
sentence.english: This shop closes at eight o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinbunsha

sentence.kanji: このビルは新聞社です。
sentence.romaji: kono biru ha shinbunsha desu
sentence.english: This building is a newspaper office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kikasu

sentence.kanji: 子供に昔話を聞かせてあげたの。
sentence.romaji: kodomo ni mukashibanashi wo kikaseteageta no 。
sentence.english: I read a story to the children.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keshite

sentence.kanji: このことを決して忘れないでください。
sentence.romaji: kono koto wo keshite wasurenai de kudasai
sentence.english: Please never forget this.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keshin

sentence.kanji: 今度こそタバコを止める決心をしました。
sentence.romaji: kondo koso tabako wo yameru keshin wo shimashita
sentence.english: I am determined to stop smoking this time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's majika

sentence.kanji: 有名人を間近で見たよ。
sentence.romaji: yuumeijin wo majika de mita yo
sentence.english: I saw a celebrity up close.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's torikime

sentence.kanji: これは会社間の取り決めです。
sentence.romaji: kore ha kaishakan no torikime desu
sentence.english: This is a decision between companies.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mon

sentence.kanji: 8時に学校の門が開きます。
sentence.romaji: 8 ji ni gakou no mon ga hirakimasu
sentence.english: The gate of the school opens at eight o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kikitori

sentence.kanji: 英語の聞き取り試験を受けたよ。
sentence.romaji: eigo no kikitori shiken wo uketa yo
sentence.english: I took an English listening comprehension exam.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaikai

sentence.kanji: 運動会は9時に開会します。
sentence.romaji: undoukai ha kuji ni kaikai shimasu
sentence.english: The sports festival starts at nine o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitochigai

sentence.kanji: すみません、人違いでした。
sentence.romaji: sumimasen hitochigai deshita
sentence.english: I'm sorry I mistook you for someone else.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chigai

sentence.kanji: この二つには大きな違いがある。
sentence.romaji: kono futatsu ni ha ooki na chigai ga aru
sentence.english: There's a big difference between these two.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kikite

sentence.kanji: 彼女はいつも聞き手にまわるね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha itsumo kikite ni mawaru ne
sentence.english: She always turns to the listener.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youma

sentence.kanji: 彼の家には洋間があります。
sentence.romaji: kare no ie ni ha youma ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a Western-style room in his house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ihan

sentence.kanji: 彼は校則に違反しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kousoku ni ihan shimashita
sentence.english: He violated school regulations.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toi

sentence.kanji: この問いに答えられますか。
sentence.romaji: kono toi ni kotaeraremasu ka
sentence.english: Can you answer this question?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senmon

sentence.kanji: 法律は私の専門です。
sentence.romaji: houritsu ha watashi no senmon desu
sentence.english: My specialty is law.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toiawaseru

sentence.kanji: 保険会社に問い合わせます。
sentence.romaji: hoken gaisha ni toiawasemasu
sentence.english: I'll inquire with my insurance company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chigainai

sentence.kanji: 彼は成功するに違いないわ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha seikou suru ni chigainai wa
sentence.english: He will certainly succeed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kansetsu

sentence.kanji: それは間接的な原因の一つです。
sentence.romaji: sore ha kansetsuteki na genin no hitotsu desu
sentence.english: It's one of the indirect causes.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seimon

sentence.kanji: 受験生は正門から入って下さい。
sentence.romaji: jukensei ha seimon kara haite kudasai
sentence.english: Test-takers must enter from the front gate.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hijoushiki

sentence.kanji: 彼は非常識な時間に電話してきたの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha hijoushiki na jikan ni denwa shite kita no
sentence.english: He called me at an unreasonable hour.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hijouguchi

sentence.kanji: ビルの非常口を確認したの。
sentence.romaji: biru no hijouguchi wo kakunin shita no
sentence.english: I checked the building's fire exit.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hijou

sentence.kanji: 非常事態です。
sentence.romaji: hijou jitai desu
sentence.english: We're in a state of emergency!

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanketsu

sentence.kanji: 判決が下された。
sentence.romaji: hanketsu ga kudasareta
sentence.english: Judgment was passed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanzai

sentence.kanji: 最近犯罪が減っています。
sentence.romaji: saikin hanzai ga hete imasu
sentence.english: Crime has been decreasing lately.
